image.description: Show on external image on the display. Several options available for alignment/styling.

iframe.description: Display an external page using an Iframe.

text.description: Display a text or document. Can be formatted using markdown, html or plain text.

remote-label.description: Show a remote JSON value on a badge in the widget section.

label.description: Show a piece of text on a badge in the widget section.

reload.description: Refresh and reinitialize the current page.
